content: Hi rustaceans! I'm hoping to contribute to the documentation and governance workgroups. My background in computing is varied, and I am on the less technical end of the spectrum, but have several years of experience as a technical writer. If you have heard of the demoscene (a computer art subculture) we may have already met. See some of you at the wg-governance meeting tomorrow.
Welcome @Val Grimm . Worth noting that both teams use discord for communication
@DPC Thank you! I also set up Discord, I wasn't really sure which modes of communication were best for what, as there are several, although I noted Discord as the location of tomorrow's meeting.
